mapper.insert: insert into tb_wxmember( wxmember_id, showlook_id, image_url, name, sex, open_id, phone, province_name, city_name, area_name, createtime, updatetime ) values ( #{wxmember_id}, #{showlook_id}, #{image_url}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{open_id}, #{phone}, #{province_name}, #{city_name}, #{area_name}, now(), now() )
insert into tb_wxmember_wealth( wxmember_id, now_integral, before_integral, createtime, updatetime ) values ( #{wxmember_id}, 0, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select wxmember_id, showlook_id, image_url, name, sex, open_id, phone from tb_wxmember where
open_id=#{open_id} wxmember_id = #{wxmember_id}
select cast(now_integral as char) as now_integral from tb_wxmember_wealth where wxmember_id = #{wxmember_id}
